# [Interview #135: Dromen and Demonen Chat, Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=135#15)

#### rafelrag

When you are writing, do you have music at the background?

#### Robert Jordan

When I am writing, I almost always have music playingâ€”usually classical music, some jazz, and some ethnic music, primarily Japanese and African.
